events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as this is quite disappointing.
The reported issue involves a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product, categorizing this as a Refund case.
Support agent Mike has been assigned to handle this case related to the refund inquiry for the incorrect item.
Hello! I’m Mike from support. Sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I’m here to help get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the mistake?
Sure, the order number is 5678392 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived instead.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund immediately and you can keep the wrong item as an apology for the inconvenience.
I appreciate that offer, thanks. I’m glad this can be resolved quickly and that I don’t have to return the item.
The refund has been issued to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect on your account.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Since the refund was completed and you’ve confirmed all is good, we are now closing this support case. Thank you!
